body.p: The WebHelp Responsive output supports dark mode, enhancing readability and reducing eye strain in low-light environments.

Both the Light and Oxygen templates support light and dark modes, which you can enable by setting the parameter. Once enabled, a "Switch theme" button will appear in the header, offering three theme options:
Auto Adapts the interface to the browser's theme.
Light Switches the interface to light mode.
Dark Switches the interface to dark mode.
If the templates above do not suit your theme, you can develop a custom one with dark mode support. You have two options: starting from an existing template or starting from scratch.
